clinical_study.brief_title: This is a Phase 1 Study of MH048 in Patients With Selected Relapsed/Refractory B-cell Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Multicenter, Open-Label, Dose Escalation and Dose Expansion Study to Investigate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics and Antitumor Activity of MH048 in Subjects With Selected Relapsed/Refractory B-cell Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1 study of MH048 in patients with selected Relapsed/Refractory B-cell Malignancies.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is an open-label, multi-center Phase 1 study of MH048 in patients with selected Relapsed/Refractory B-cell Malignancies.
This study includes 2 parts: Part A is the dose escalation part of the study, and Part B is the dose expansion part of the study. In Part A, patients were enrolled using accelerated titration design for the first three single patient cohorts and 3+3 dose escalation design for the rest cohorts. The starting dose of MH048 in soft gel capsule form was 5 mg/day QD. Cycle length will be 28 days. In Part B, the dose and lymphoma subtypes for expansion phase will depend on the results from Part A.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the incidence and severity of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability]
primary_outcome.description: Assess incidence and severity of treatment-emergent adverse events as determined by CTCAE v5.0

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the MTD of MH048
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of Cycle 1( 28 day) of each dose escalation cohort.
primary_outcome.description: If 2 or more treated subjects at a dose level experience a DLT before Day 28, dose escalation will stop and the prior dose level will be considered the MTD for that schedule.
The determination of RP2D for phase 2 according to the result of dose expansion cohorts.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of Cycle 1 (each cycle is 28 days)
At the end of Cycle 1 (each cycle is 28 days)
At the end of Cycle 1 (each cycle is 28 days)
At the end of Cycle 1 (each cycle is 28 days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Preliminary evidence of anti-tumor activity, in terms of Objective Response Rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of best overall response (BoR) of CR or PR, assessed up to approximately 24 months.
secondary_outcome.description: The number (%) of subjects with best overall response (BoR) of CR or PR.

secondary_outcome.measure: Preliminary evidence of anti-tumor activity, in terms of Duration of Response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first documented of CR or PR to the first documented PD or death due to any cause, whichever came first, , assessed up to approximately 24 months.
secondary_outcome.description: The duration from the first documentation of CR or PR to the first documented PD or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part A: Dose Escalation and Determination of RP2D
arm_group.description: Part A: Dose Escalation and determination of RP2D, multiple dose levels of MH048 to be evaluated

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part B: Dose Expansion in Selected Relapsed/Refractory B-cell Malignancies
arm_group.description: Part B: Selected relapsed/refractory B-NHL subjects with at least 1 prior systemic OR standard-of-care therapy.

intervention.description: Soft gel capsules 5 mg and 25 mg，oral MH048 should be administered after an overnight fast.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part A: Dose Escalation and Determination of RP2D
Part B: Dose Expansion in Selected Relapsed/Refractory B-cell Malignancies
